archimate:Requirement.name: Development of New TEMA must be agile
archimate:Requirement.documentation:
TEMA development must be agile - this does not mean unstructured - it means
1. It must be broken down into appropriately sized work packages 2. Resourcing for each package must be clearly defined & work packages are not executed until they are fully staffed. 3. The goals for work packages must be SMART 4. Dependencies must be clearly stated 5. Deliverables must be clearly stated, and all work packages must bring some tangible value. We cannot run projects only to define more projects, or design. Something must be implemented too.
